text: Isabelle d'Arc (née Isabelle Romee {unverified} also known as Isabelle de Vouthon and Ysabeau Romee; 137728 November 1458) was the mother of Joan of Arc. Besides her she had four other children. On November 28, 1458, she died near Orleans in France. Category:1370s births Category:1458 deaths Category:French people
title: Isabelle Romée
